Articles.Content:
I don't get this. I took these Kerbals (plus two others for another mission) saw the check marks beside their mission during the flight indicating success, brought them back safely and it shows complete, but no mission credit. Any ideas? 

 

Edited September 14, 2016 by shadragon

I'm going to start with a ludicrously simple question, so apologies and please don't think I'm being obtuse:  Did you recover the vessell and crew at the end of the mission?

Otherwise - Hmm, what version of KSP are you running.  I believe that this used to be a known issue, as per this thread, but unless you have an old version of KSP I am for the moment stumped.

SM

I scoffed at this answer then looked at my tracking station. Yup. Fat finger error. 

When I landed, I sent Valentina out for an EVA and surface sample. THEN I hit recover and only she was brought back. So the four others were sitting in the grasslands for the better part of a week. 

Cheers.

10 hours ago, shadragon said:

When I landed, I sent Valentina out for an EVA and surface sample. THEN I hit recover and only she was brought back. So the four others were sitting in the grasslands for the better part of a week.

WOOT!  I answered something

SM
